body: Maybe nameserver should be a part of the _default instanceName_.

> If users start the mutiple producer or consumer instances in the same process,the instance name is the same one.You can set different instance name in the start method when the traceProducer is started. @ahuazhu

If set different instance name for trace producer, multiple client instances will be created.

log使用的是MappedByteBuffer，不受MaxDirectMemorySize的限制
Link #1267
@finalcola 那java中有没有办法限制MappedByteBuffer的内存 ？
不知道，估计只能把日志过期时间(默认是72小时)设置得小些，避免加载的日志文件过多
@finalcola 好的，谢谢了！ ps.  我尝试了使用cgroup来限制， 对于二进制可执行程序，cgroup可以限制回收mmap内存，但对java，cgroup就无效了

@finalcola 
Does this cause any problem?
1. MappedByteBuffer creates Virtual-memory mapping with JVM memory thus READ/WRITE operations do not need System-Call. And it does not occupy the JVM heap but virtual memory space only. 

2. When you use `top` to diagnose the memory usage, a large `RES` may be displayed. Just feel free, you could use `free -m` or `free -g` to check the actual memory usage by `used`.  You may also find an amount of memory used by `buff/cache`, you could treat this part of memory as `free`.

ons 应该在外层做了一个包装,他只是为了一个资源的隔离 但是目前的ons 也么有生产组这样的概念了,可以自行搞一个 acl 的验证如果非常需要的话

是的，特别是多个产品线使用的话，必须得控制生产组。
我也考虑使用acl，但是目前acl 还没有mqadmin的命令行支持，维护管理很麻烦。
但是我有个疑问，为什么订阅组都有接口命令行支持，为什么生产组不支持呢？ 当时设计者咋考虑的？
processQueueTable，当前消息队列缓存表，如果缓存表中的 MessageQueue 不包含在 mqSet 中，说明经过本次负载后，该 mq 被分配给其他消费者，故需要暂停该消息队列消息的消费，方法 是将 ProccessQueue 的状态设置为 draped=true
因为 mq 本身设计的时候,他需要管理consumer,比如consumer 的顺序 consumer负载,语义的保证但是对于producer 本身不关新这些顺序负载 这情况
Hi @jenvenson this pr will fix the issue that you put forward.
Thanks a lot~
producer不涉及到负载均衡等，涉及到的纯粹是一个生产者的标识，broker其实是不太关心的，group管理起来估计也就是统计的需要，所以broker管理起来是不是也不是那么必要？

> 
> 
> processQueueTable，当前消息队列缓存表，如果缓存表中的 MessageQueue 不包含在 mqSet 中，说明经过本次负载后，该 mq 被分配给其他消费者，故需要暂停该消息队列消息的消费，方法 是将 ProccessQueue 的状态设置为 draped=true

Hi @jonnxu @ShannonDing @duhenglucky  please help to review this pr.

以windows为例：
第一步启动namesrv
语句为：mqnamesrv.cmd -n localhost:9876
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33364674/60500335-bdada700-9cec-11e9-8794-6c1766a1442f.png)

第二步启动broker
语句为：mqbroker.cmd -n localhost:9876 autoCreateTopicEnable=true &
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33364674/60500284-a53d8c80-9cec-11e9-88bf-2a0f33b17581.png)

第三步创建TopicTest这个Topic
语句为：mqadmin.cmd updateTopic -b 10.127.127.1:10911(这边放第二步中获得的，-b是单机，-c是集群) -n localhost:9876 -t TopicTest
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33364674/60500398-d74eee80-9cec-11e9-9778-ce9b96cf4ace.png)

注意，我已经将E:\rocketmq-all-4.5.1-bin-release\bin放入环境变量了，并且系统防火墙已经关闭了。之所以这边我创建Topic的名字是TopicTest，是因为官方样例中用的Topic叫TopicTest。
I think this is a fast-fail design. By doing this, it can prevent other requests from being blocked by the failed broker

The overhead of creating objects in milliseconds of the current system and requiring two function calls is not worth it. The sentinel scenario does work well with a volatile variable and an asynchronous thread.

@RickySongyz It would be nice if you can modify this PR as @zongtanghu @ShannonDing suggestion, and I will temporarily close this PR, and please feel free to reopen it if you want to do more work with it.

@lazyfighter Up to now, the above code of RocketMQ has not encountered bottlenecks. Of course, the above sentinel code optimizes the number of system calls, but it also causes the complexity of the code to rise. Of course, RocketMQ may optimize this part of the code in the future. and issue only used be bug report and feature request, so, it would be nice if we can discuss these question in our mailing list(https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/)
@TaXueWWL it would be nice if you can pull a request to fix it. :)
@wangjuneng as you mentioned, the batch message hasn't been supported in RocketMQ on dleger mode. so cloud you pull a request to implement it? we will help you to complete this PR.

@mushanshitiancai this strategy allows the producer to prioritize the available brokers. and RocketMQ also provide config(sendLatencyFaultEnable) to do more with it. 
And issue only used be bug report and feature request, so, it would be nice if we can discuss these question in our mailing list(https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/), so I will close this issue firstly, but please feel free to reopen it.
@wangfcdl cloud you upgrade your client version to 4.5.1?

@it would be better if you can upgrade your rocketmq version to 4.x or higher, and we do not recommend to delete system config topic or consumer group. 
And issue only used be bug report and feature request, so, it would be nice if we can discuss these question in our mailing list(https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/), so I will close this issue firstly, but please feel free to reopen it.

@aaron1989041 读写队列是逻辑上的概念，队列创建的时候会以写为准，你可以尝试着去设置不同的读写队列，看下producer以及consumer的表现。这个功能尤其是在系统收缩的时候非常有用，比如说现在有8个队列，我把写队列设置为4，那么其中的4个队列就不再写入，只需要在另外4个队列全部消费成功后下掉即可。另外，issue 只用于bug报告以及新特性提出，希望可以在邮件列表里面讨论问题呀（https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/），很多小伙伴会及时回复的。
@jenvenson it would be nice if you can describe your question in detail？
